summary: This is a brief email chain regarding the Office of Professional Responsibility's (OPR) final report on the Jeffrey Epstein matter. The email from January 29, 2021, requests a meeting to discuss the report, which was transmitted with a cover letter on November 12, 2020.

events.title: OPR Final Report Transmittal
events.description: The Office of Professional Responsibility (OPR) transmitted its final report and a transmittal letter regarding the Jeffrey Epstein matter.

keyFacts: The Office of Professional Responsibility (OPR) completed a final report on the Jeffrey Epstein matter.
The final report was transmitted with a cover letter on November 12, 2020.
A follow-up email on January 29, 2021, requested a meeting to discuss the OPR report.
